items.sentence: Have you ever wanted something so much that you\'d do anything to get it?
Would you eat the last cookie on the plate if other people were watching?
Tom walks through a very classy neighborhood on his way home from school.
When Tom met Mary at the station, he asked her how her vacation had been.
Tom knew that Mary wouldn\'t be able to do what she thought she could do.
At least Tom stuck around long enough to find out how much money he owed.
Tom and Mary lay down side by side on the grass and looked at the clouds.
Tom doesn\'t want to admit it, but he\'s excited about tomorrow\'s dance.
In this country, public displays of affection are generally frowned upon.
Many people seem to be interested in knowing the answer to that question.
